title: F1 in Barcelona: Circuit de Catalunya's explosive opening and evolution
summary: Built in 1991 as part of a major regional initiative, the Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya been home of the Spanish GP ever since, witnessing legendary moments in both F1 history
